title: Repair
description: A document representing a jewelry repair order

repairID.description: The unique identifier for the repair order

userID.description: Reference to the unique identifier of the user who requested the repair

description.description: Detailed description of the repair job

picture.description: URL or path to an image of the item being repaired

receivedDate.description: Date when the item was received for repair

promiseDate.description: Date by which the repair is promised to be completed

metalType.description: Type of metal involved in the repair

repairTasks.description: List of tasks associated with the repair job
